title: Vision. [No. 20]
creator_credit: United States Information Agency, Thomas Craven Films, Thomas Craven, Willis Briley, Carl Carbone, Chris Anderson and Stuart Hersh
brief_description: Cinemagazine: Don Miller, a pewter-smith; a scanning electron microscope; oyster dredging in Chesapeake Bay; quartz watches; Barbara Morgan, a photographer; and a tiny pedal-powered non-polluting Pedicar.
